Published January 16 2015

Partners at Teehan+Lax Join Facebook

Partners at Teehan+Lax Join Facebook — If you’re a designer, chances are you know who Teehan+Lax are or you’ve used their work. Looks like not everyone gets to go to Facebook, which means that a lot of amazing design talent just became available in Toronto.

Enjoy your day.
